DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this survey of international HIPEC (Hyperthermic Intraperitoneal Chemotherapy) surgeons is to determine their knowledge of and attitudes towards the nutritional support needs of HIPEC patients and what their practice patterns are with this patient population.
DOC.brief_title: Knowledge, Attitudes, and Practice of Surgeons Toward Nutrition Support in HIPEC Patients
DOC.criteria: Surgeon trained in and performing the HIPEC procedure Not performing the HIPEC procedure
